price: 79.Kaadu Yalla kinni sinaamey baaxö bagul sin gintem, kaadu rabteeniik gamadal kaä fanah maagowtan cisab kee galtoh.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī dhara-akum fī al-arḍi wa-ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
